random_200_tempcompass_qa_json.question:
What is the little lion doing?
A. sitting nearby an adult lion
B. sitting on the back of an adult lion
C. falling from the back of an adult lion
D. jumping onto the back of an adult lion
random_200_tempcompass_qa_json.answer: D. jumping onto the back of an adult lion
